Well, files are still fucked up..

The files are screwed but recoverable, albeit without menus. Run it through DVD Shrink with the reauthor function and that will rebuild the missing video_ts files to enable it to be played on a standard DVD player. Subs are Portuguese, Dutch, Danish, Swedish, Nordic and Finnish. There are no English or other subs. Format is PAL 16x9 WS, and quality seems ok.
Kan du seede Olsenbanden og dynamitt Harry, Kongen og Knekten, og på sporet igjen. Har stått stille lenge. Mange som venter på å få avsluttet nedlastingen.
